Summary: a bunch of red turned white lights trailing the plane for 5 minutes.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Unknown- Prob North GA
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsFlying on the plane started seeing thre to four red lights showing than disappearing in the cloud, yet we are 38-40 thousand feet in the air. i take out my camera and start shooting. yet the lights come and go up and down and from red to white. I actually didn't see the big pink one but its hovering over the plane, saw it when i looked at my pictures. Left from laguardia to atlanta georgia. flight left at 5:59 pm landed at 8:07 pm.
